Public.Name: SetValues
Public.Source: this.Values = v;    if (this.control != null) this.control[0].values = this.Values;

Public.Name: SetValue
Public.Source: this.setAttribute(v);	if (this.control != null) this.control[0].value = v;    if (this.ControlValueChanged) {      this.ControlValueChanged();    }

Private.Name: _resolveValue
Private.Source: return provided == undefined || provided == '' || provided == null ? defaultValue : provided;

Private.Name: _getTranslatedMessage
Private.Source: if (msg.indexOf('GX') == 0 || msg.indexOf('K2B') == 0) {      var translated = gx.msg[msg];      if (translated !== undefined) {        return translated;      }    }    return msg;

AfterShow.Name: ButtonHandlers
AfterShow.Source: var uc = this;		var container = this.getContainerControl();	this.control = $(container).find("k2bt-toggle-bar");	this.control[0].enabled = this.Enabled;    this.control[0].readonlyClass = this.Class.split(' ')        .map(s => 'Readonly' + s)        .join(' ');	this.control[0].emptyitemtext = this._getTranslatedMessage(this._resolveValue(this.EmptyItemText, 'GX_EmptyItemText'));	this.control[0].noresultsfoundtext = this._getTranslatedMessage(this._resolveValue(this.NoResultsFoundText, 'K2BT_NoItems'));	this.control[0].additemcaption = this._getTranslatedMessage(this._resolveValue(this.AddItemCaption, 'K2BT_EnhancedComboAddItemCaption'));		if(uc.Values != undefined && uc.Values != null){		this.control[0].values = uc.Values;	}		this.control.on('change', function (event) {		uc.setAttribute(event.originalEvent.detail);		if (uc.ControlValueChanged) {			uc.ControlValueChanged();		}	});
